name: Oasim
description:
Oasim is the result of the three day 'Mini Jam 53' game jam. It's a minimalistic desert survival manager that utilizes cellular dynamics. You provide water to travellers that tend to get lost and deyhdrated. They also like to share and walk in groups.

I might work on this some more in the future.

I used the monogram font made by datagoblin. The music I recoreded myself.

Controls

  • R - Restart
  • M - Mute
  • Left Click - Spawn water
